title: Epic Food Company
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, American, International, Organic, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Plenty of choices for vegans including tofu and vegetable. You choose a protein, a base (wrap or bowl), greens, lettuce or flat bread, veggies/herbs and a sauce. Has children's meals. Serves infused waters (different every day), VitaCoco and more. Eclectic and comfortable atmosphere. Surf shop inside restaurant. Located in the Forum.
